note.p: Birth: 18 November 1897
Death: 13 July 1974
Education: MA
Career: Fellow of King's College, Cambridge; University Lecturer in Physics
Honours: CH 1965; OM 1967; Baron 1969
Membership: Fellow
Election Date: 11/05/1933
Medals/Prizes: Royal Medal 1940; Copley Medal 1956; Nobel Prize (Physics) 1948
Lectures: Bakerian 1939; Rutherford 1958
Sources: Bulloch's Roll
AssocMaterial: CSAC 63/1/79. Papers deposited in the Royal Society Library
Obituaries: Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society 1975 vol 21 pp 1-115, plate, by Sir Bernard Lovell
